name: Mike.cpp
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 47 game jam.

My first entry for Ludum Dare game jam!

Our boy, Mike got stuck in the loop, but the question is how did he get stuck in it? Who or what caused that? Feel free to play to see it!

Please don't forget to drop a comment!

HTML version doesn't show some videos and effects that are in the game. It's recommended you to play from the Windows Build.

Controllers:

"WASD" to move.

"E" to interact.

"Left Click" to control the yoyo.

All assets have created by me.

__________________________________________

Mac and Linux versions will be coming soon.
